title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.28 - Meters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.28 - Meters

State Regulations

Metering information shall be generated on a gaming
device and collected by the interface element and sent to the MCS via a
communication protocol. Such information may be either read directly from the
gaming device or relayed using a delta function. Metering information on the
MCS shall be labeled so that such information can be understood clearly in
accordance with the relevant function. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.28

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
